name: Shoot the UFO!
description:
170 One Hour Jam Game. Theme: 5 seconds

You must take a photo of a UFO, but it is difficult and your boss want that picture NOW!!!!

If you take a good picture, maybe your boss gives you more time to take another one..

CHANGELOG

v2:

  • Music changed
  • Camera sound added
  • Camera frame improved
  • Typography improved
  • Texts improved
  • Difficulty reduced
  • Fixed title "Shot the UFO!" => "Shoot the UFO!"
  • Fixed: Text "MEH" when you restart a game
  • Fixed: music hasn't loop

v1:

  • Original #1HGJ version
